context_bundle.summary: Jenkins is an open-source automation server that enables CI/CD through pipeline-as-code, extensive plugin ecosystem, and distributed builds across multiple agents

onboarding.quick_start: Initialize Jenkins CI/CD Platform, configure basic setup, and follow best practices for deployment and management
common_patterns: Setup: Initial configuration and deployment of Jenkins CI/CD Platform
Integration: Connect with existing tools and workflows
Security: Apply security best practices and access controls
Scaling: Design for growth and high availability
Automation: Automate routine tasks and operations
known_errors: Configuration errors: Validate settings and dependencies
Network issues: Check connectivity and firewall rules
Permission problems: Verify access rights and authentication
Resource constraints: Monitor CPU, memory, and storage
Version conflicts: Ensure compatibility between components
